'''"A Bloatty Floatty's Dream of the Sky"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "A Bloatty Floatty's Dream of the Sky" is obtainable from the [[Traveler's Picture Book]] Web Event.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|30|x=60}}.

|Fabric = 8
|time = 14h
